ivardefs.name: attester_
ivardefs.desc: A participant who has attested to the accuracy of the composition/document.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies who is responsible for the information in the composition, not necessarily who typed it in.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: A categorization for the type of the composition - helps for indexing and searching. This may be implied by or derived from the code specified in the Composition Type.

ivardefs.name: confidentiality
ivardefs.desc: The code specifying the level of confidentiality of the Composition.

ivardefs.name: custodian
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the organization or group who is responsible for ongoing maintenance of and access to the composition/document information.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The composition editing time, when the composition was last logically changed by the author.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: Describes the clinical encounter or type of care this documentation is associated with.

ivardefs.name: event_
ivardefs.desc: The clinical service, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: A version-independent identifier for the Composition. This identifier stays constant as the composition is changed over time.

ivardefs.name: relatesTo_
ivardefs.desc: Relationships that this composition has with other compositions or documents that already exist.

ivardefs.name: section_
ivardefs.desc: The root of the sections that make up the composition.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The workflow/clinical status of this composition. The status is a marker for the clinical standing of the document.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Who or what the composition is about. The composition can be about a person, (patient or healthcare practitioner), a device (e.g. a machine) or even a group of subjects (such as a document about a herd of livestock, or a set of patients that share a commo

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: Official human-readable label for the composition.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Specifies the particular kind of composition (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). This usually equates to the purpose of making the composition.

properties.desc: A set of healthcare-related information that is assembled together into a single logical package that provides a single coherent statement of meaning, establishes its own context and that has clinical attestation with regard to who is making the statement
